articles.description: Since his return to India’s T20 blues, Ashwin had only batted a total of 27 deliveries. He had procured a four and two sixes but none at a ground this big. But here he was. Now all set to face that last ball, or as it was supposed to be.
articles.content: Lets go back to December 2016. Ravichandran Ashwin had just watched Chennai 28 II, for the first time. Sequel of the 2007 Venkat Prabhu directorial based on friendship set against the backdrop of gul… [+5269 chars]

articles.title: Pollard bemoans 'sad day' for WI cricket, says players not at fault for T20 WC exit - ESPNcricinfo
